author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Simpson Manufacturing Reports Q4 EPS $0.27
text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Simpson Manufacturing Co Inc:
* ANNOUNCES 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 SALES ROSE 16 PERCENT TO $231.7 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.27 * SIMPSON MANUFACTURING CO - ENACTMENT OF TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT IN DECEMBER 2017 RESULTED AN IMPACT OF $0.04/FULLY DILUTED SHARE IN Q4
* COMPANY ESTIMATES THAT ITS FULL-YEAR 2018 GROSS PROFIT MARGIN WILL BE BETWEEN APPROXIMATELY 45% TO 46%
* COMPANY CURRENTLY BELIEVES MARKET PRICE FOR STEEL WILL INCREASE DURING Q1 OF 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
